1.name: Facility ID
1.description: This field contains the facility identifier

10.name: Signature Authority Title
10.description: This field contains the title of the individual with signature authority or who is responsible for this report

11.name: Signature Authority Address
11.description: This field contains the address of the individual with signature authority or who is responsible for this report

12.name: Signature Authority Telecommunication
12.description: This field contains the telecommunication information of the individual with signature authority of who is responsible for this report

2.name: Facility Type
2.description: This field contains the type of facility. Refer to HL7 table 0331 - Facility type for valid values
2.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

3.name: Facility Address
3.description: This field contains the facility’s address

4.name: Facility Telecommunication
4.description: This field contains the facility’s telecommunication information

5.name: Contact Person
5.description: This field contains the primary contact person’s name
5.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name

6.name: Contact Title
6.description: This field contains the primary contact person’s title

7.name: Contact Address
7.description: This field contains the primary contact person’s address

8.name: Contact Telecommunication
8.description: This field contains the primary contact person’s telecommunication information

9.name: Signature Authority
9.description: This field contains the name of the individual with signature authority or who is responsible for the report
9.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name
